kpi.name: LTE_664a

kpi_info.title: OUTB VLAN Intf EF PHB DV
kpi_info.use: Data Volume transmitted by the interface, including framing characters, using Expedited Forwarding PHB class. The KPI is available for both the Ethernet-based IP interface and for each VLAN interface of the BTS.

kpi.kpi_alias: OUTB VLAN Intf EF PHB DV
